issue.title: [Java] Integration tests for the C data Interface implementation for Java
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14374](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14374). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Integration tests for the C data interface implementation for java ARROW-12965.

The integration is against pyarrow.
